name: Auto Filter Bot V2
description: A Filter Bot Which Doesnt Need Manuall Filter Adding

APP_ID.description: Your APP ID From my.telegram.org or @UseTGXBot

API_HASH.description: Your API Hash From my.telegram.org or @UseTGXBot

DB_URI.description: Your Mongo DB URL Obtained From mongodb.com

START_MSG.description: set your own custom start message

START_MSG_BUTTON_NAME_1.description: set your own start message 1st button name (default name :- Developers)

START_MSG_BUTTON_NAME_2.description: set your own start message 2nd button name (default name :- Source Code ðŸ§¾)

START_MSG_BUTTON_NAME_3.description: set your own start message 3rd button name (default name :- Support ðŸ› )

START_MSG_BUTTON_LINK_1.description: set your own start message 1st button link (default link :- https://t.me/CrazyBotsz)

START_MSG_BUTTON_LINK_2.description: set your own start message 2nd button link (default link :- https://github.com/AlbertEinsteinTG/Adv-Auto-Filter-Bot-V2)

START_MSG_BUTTON_LINK_3.description: set your own start message 3rd button link (default link :- https://t.me/CrazyBotszGrp)

ENABLE_PIC.description: set (yes)  set your own custom media (use small letter)

USER_SESSION.description: A Pyrogram User Session String. Generated From @PyrogramStringBot
